title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, create, push, list models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Experimental repo showing how to expose Python functions as tools that Ollama models can call.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Merged Nixpkgs pull request adding Ollama package and NixOS module.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async/await bindings for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Official Zig client library for Ollama (early preview).

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; thin wrapper over REST API with context cancellation.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Production-ready Slack bot with conversation memory, rate-limiting and usage analytics.
